title: A movie you just see!
review:
So many movies out now are Super hero or CGI movies. It's nice to see a movie with a great story and relatable. When you move to a new city you are looking for a sense of community. Great characters and relationships.
Really liked the leads relationship and the random drunk guy.

title: So LA
review: Loved this film! Seriously well done & super funny. Brooke Lewis did a great job, she's as funny as Pam Deluca.

title: Lots of fun!
review: Caught this at the Valley Film Festival and thought it was a wonderfully fun time. Talented group of actors, beautifully shot, and excellently directed. Didn't waste a moment with this film!
